name: off
text: 『何もしなくても時計の針は回る』──
trans: 『Even if I do nothing, the hands of the clock spins』

name: プロデューサー
trans: ──Ah, its the promotional video of the girl that day.

name: 円香
text:
……何もしなくても回るなら、
なんでわざわざ回すんでしょうね
trans:
...If it spins despite nothing being done,
why bother to spin it in the first place.

name: プロデューサー
text: なんだろう、衝動みたいなものなのかな
trans: Well, maybe it has got to do with impulse.

name: 円香
text: ここでたくさんの人が落ちると思いますが
trans: Even though many people fail here,

name: 円香
text:
10年後、20年後……
何人が『あの頃は無謀な夢を見た』と言うのでしょうね
trans:
Ten, twenty years later...
A few would say "I had such an impulsive dream back
then", won't they.

name: 円香
text:
必死に針を回したのに、
そんな過去の自分を笑って
trans:
Desperately turning the clock and laughing at their
previous self.

name: 円香
text: きっと乗り越えた顔をする
trans: Making it look like they've gotten over it.
